title: How can someone start a 5G company? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its actually very easy:Raise $500 Million to $1 Billion USDHire a staffHire a world class architectDesign the product that you want to sellHire the best engineers in the worldDevelop the best product that solves problems that no one else in the industry has solvedRaise another $500 MillionHire a marketing and advertising company to being attracting customersHire lawyersContract with factories to make your productHire a sales department to take ordersHire a fulfillment department to fill ordersHire support staffCollect customer complaints and personally decide how to resolve them

I don’t think you understand what you are asking. 5G infrastructure is massively expensive, in the hundreds of millions of dollars category. You can’t start a “5G company” if you are asking how to do that on Quora. Perhaps you are meaning to ask “how can I start a company to take advantage of 5G?” In this case, again, you may not understand. 5G is just the next generation of mobile cellular communication. So if you want to take advantage of 5G (which will not be prevalent until 2021 or beyond), start by thinking about 4G today.
